message: As soon as we get inside, Mink hurls me to the floor.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh, gah...!"
My back takes the full force of the impact, blasting the air from my lungs.
Next, something explodes against my right cheek. I curl up into a ball, coughing.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ughh..."
After the fifth or sixth punch, the room starts to sway.
My mouth is full of blood. All I can smell is iron.
A kick to my stomach leaves me gasping.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ungh..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ow... Gah... Ugh, guh..."
The heavy toe of his boot sinks into my stomach again. This time, the pain makes me black out for a second.
I can barely breathe as it is, but the nausea and coughing makes it worse. My eyes fill with tears.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Guh... Ugh..."
I fear that it will go on forever, but suddenly, the pain begins to fade.
My thoughts, too, start to feel murky, like I'm drifting off to sleep.
You know... it'd be so much easier I just pass out...
Just as that thought floats lazily through my mind―

name: ミンク
message: "Wake the fuck up."
